title: Phone 2 Location - Caller ID Mobile Number Tracker
description:
Phone 2 Location is the best caller Id & tracker which allows to search, track and block any mobile number or fixed line (landline) phone number.
App will track the city, state, country and service providers (telecom operators)  of the phone number.
App Features:
★ Number Tracker app track any mobile number or landline number from USA, India, Canada, UK, China and other countries.
It shows geographic location details like city, state, country & telecom operator of incoming calls, mobile contacts or any mobile number.
★ Caller ID helps you to identify unknown phone numbers. The feature can be adjusted in the settings menu.
★ Mobile phone contacts arranged by locations (at Country, State, District, City level).
★ Call blocker allows you to block unwanted calls like telemarketers, spam callers, fraud callers, etc.
★ Offline support and works even without internet connection. Search & track number locations, std codes & isd codes even without internet.
★ Excellent UI & support for multiple themes.
Note:
★ Mobile Number Portability (MNP) not supported.
★ It will show location at city/ state & country level only and not GPS location.
★ For India, it will show at state level for mobile numbers and at city, district, state level for landline numbers.
★ For India, Std codes updated with district information.
★ For USA & Canada, all area codes (npa nxx) updated.
★ Supported countries: USA, Canada, India, United Kingdom(UK), China
★ Updated area codes for subscriber trunk dialing (STD), international subscriber dialing(ISD) and mobile number series. Search and lookup any phone number.
INTRODUCING Phone 2 Location CALLER ID!
Phone 2 Location caller ID helps you identify numbers real-time while the call is happening - even the ones not in your phonebook. No more number guessing or avoiding unknown callers – Phone 2 Location caller ID prepares you for the call. You can always adjust your caller ID settings in the settings menu.
